title: Pragma: Stand In Love
description: Their meeting was destined. Their love transcendent. But will their love be enough to overcome the forces of darkness that work to tear them apart? A year after their fateful meeting, Ava and Evan are getting married. This should be a joyful time for them both, but when a mysterious letter arrives, Ava is forced to face the mistakes of the past she thought she had escaped.  Someone is watching Ava and her friends, someone who knows their deepest desires and their darkest secrets; someone who will stop at nothing to destroy them. It will take the unique talents and faith of their karass to combat the forces of the Evil Ones.
author: Beca Lewis
